methods.name: glm::orientation
methods.parameters: const glm::vec3 &Normal=P, const glm::vec3 &Up=P
methods.short: Build a rotation matrix from a normal and a up vector. From GLM_GTX_rotate_vector extension.

methods.name: glm::rotate
methods.parameters: const glm::vec2 &v=P, const T &angle
methods.short: Rotate a two dimensional vector. From GLM_GTX_rotate_vector extension.

methods.name: glm::rotate
methods.parameters: const glm::vec3 &v=P, const T &angle, const glm::vec3 &normal=P
methods.short: Rotate a three dimensional vector around an axis. From GLM_GTX_rotate_vector extension.

methods.name: glm::rotate
methods.parameters: const glm::vec4 &v=P, const T &angle, const glm::vec3 &normal=P
methods.short: Rotate a four dimensional vector around an axis. From GLM_GTX_rotate_vector extension.

methods.name: glm::rotateX
methods.parameters: const glm::vec3 &v=P, const T &angle
methods.short: Rotate a three dimensional vector around the X axis. From GLM_GTX_rotate_vector extension.

methods.name: glm::rotateX
methods.parameters: const glm::vec4 &v=P, const T &angle
methods.short: Rotate a four dimentionnals vector around the X axis. From GLM_GTX_rotate_vector extension.

methods.name: glm::rotateY
methods.parameters: const glm::vec3 &v=P, const T &angle
methods.short: Rotate a three dimensional vector around the Y axis. From GLM_GTX_rotate_vector extension.

methods.name: glm::rotateY
methods.parameters: const glm::vec4 &v=P, const T &angle
methods.short: Rotate a four dimensional vector around the X axis. From GLM_GTX_rotate_vector extension.

methods.name: glm::rotateZ
methods.parameters: const glm::vec3 &v=P, const T &angle
methods.short: Rotate a three dimensional vector around the Z axis. From GLM_GTX_rotate_vector extension.

methods.name: glm::rotateZ
methods.parameters: const glm::vec4 &v=P, const T &angle
methods.short: Rotate a four dimensional vector around the X axis. From GLM_GTX_rotate_vector extension.

methods.name: glm::slerp
methods.parameters: const glm::vec3 &x=P, const glm::vec3 &y=P, const T &a
methods.short:
Returns Spherical interpolation between two vectors

Parameters:

x A first vector

y A second vector

a Interpolation factor. The interpolation is defined beyond the range [0, 1].

See also: gtx_rotate_vector
